title: Equinor's share saving plan allocates shares - Equinor's share saving plan allocates shares - equinor.com
description: The shares purchased by DNB on behalf of Equinor ASA on 15 June 2018 for use in the group's Share Saving Plan have on 20 June 2018 been distributed to the employees in accordance with their savings amount.
content:
Equinor's share saving plan allocates shares

June 20, 2018 07:35 CEST

The shares purchased by DNB on behalf of Equinor ASA (OSE: EQNR, NYSE: EQNR) on 15 June 2018 for use in the group's Share Saving Plan have on 20 June 2018 been distributed to the employees in accordance with their savings amount.

Following this, the share saving plan has 9,097,482 shares.

This information is subject to the disclosure requirements pursuant to section 5 -12 of the Norwegian Securities Trading Act.
